Name: Avoid It!
About the game: Every situation has a way out! Welcome to the game Avoid It! - the place where everyone can come, but not everyone can leave. The action takes place between some containers where your mission as the main participant is to drive a route that is full of traps and tortures. Choose the right car to do such stunts and start the adventure! We strongly recommend you to put on your seat belt because you may be exposed to some critical blows that put your life at risk. Good Luck! Game Features : - 9 different cars - 30 levels - Unforeseen situations
